DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Japan. The aim of this non-interventional study is to investigate the safety and effectiveness of treatment with eptacog alpha (NovoSeven速) when undergoing surgery under normal clinical practice conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Non-Interventional Study of NovoSeven速 Used in Patients With Haemophilia A and B With Inhibitors When Undergoing Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients with haemophilia A and B with inhibitors who received eptacog alpha (NovoSeven速) as treatment when undergoing surgery Patients who was not deemed to be appropriate to the treatment of eptacog alpha (NovoSeven速)
